parameters.name: Storage Selection
parameters.description: Select storage to mount. Volumes will be created at <host_mountpoint>/volumes/<hostname>/<volume-key>. If not provided, volumes will be created under /mnt/volumes/<hostname>/<volume-key>.

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: UID for the user and mount permissions. Will be used consistently on VE host and LXC container.

parameters.name: GID
parameters.description: GID for the user and mount permissions. Will be used consistently on VE host and LXC container.
